Firstly, I would like to thank Lau Chun Yin Vincent for establishing and managing DevC HK! ðŸ¤—ðŸŒ¹   Now that Vincent has stepped down from leadership, **we are accepting applications for the position of DevC HK Lead.** If you are a passionate developer and care about your local community, please apply to become a co-leader. **Here is the link** :

Apply now! Each year, Facebook invites PhD students from around the world to apply for the Facebook Fellowship, a program designed to encourage and support promising doctoral students who are engaged in innovative and relevant research in areas related to computer science and engineering.

Hello developers in Hong Kong,  I'm Layla, the Developer Programs Regional Lead for APAC at Facebook.   Weâ€™re looking for **new volunteer leads **to bring this circle to the next level. If youâ€™re passionate about your local developer ecosystem, and are able to volunteer your time and talent as a DevC lead, please fill out an application here and indicate **Hong Kong** under â€˜cityâ€™.: https://developers.facebook.com/developercircles/lead/apply  If weâ€™re not able to find a suitable community leader in the coming weeks, we will unfortunately have to archive this group until a suitable volunteer leadership team can be found and formed. In the meantime, given that all Developer Circles events are currently being held online due to the pandemic, we also encourage you to search for and join other nearby Developer Circles on our website:   Find nearby circles:  https://developers.facebook.com/developercircles/join/  Facebook Developer Circle: Taipei - https://www.facebook.com/groups/813879575430133  Facebook Developer Circle: Singapore - https://www.facebook.com/groups/738142713218042  Thank you and stay safe.ðŸ¥°
